introduction.para: The parameter properties pane allows editing of the parameter attributes such as name, expression, units and free text annotations. Note:

list.item: Description cannot be changed for any type of parameter.
For 'Reaction' parameters that are not user-defined, only Name and Expression of parameter can be changed.
For 'Application' parameters, only their Expression can be changed.

appearance.para: Each of the parameter attributes are displayed in a text field in the properties pane. Depending on the type of parameter, the corresponding text fields are enabled or disabled.

operations.para: Clicking inside an editable text field allows the user to change the value of the appropriate attribute for the parameter. If the user tries to change the name of a parameter by typing a name that already exists, an error dialog is shown, preventing the user from using the name.
